entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 04:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
